      • onlineTraining

        public void onlineTraining(double[] x1,
                           double y1)
        This method can be used to do the online training Upon the receiving IMessage with a double [] = {y_i, x_i1, ...x_id}
        Parameters:
        x1 - data point with d elements
        y1 - label an integer [-1, +1] for binary classification
